runs.comm: down the pitch straight away, whips that fullish ball past a diving midwicket for a single
tossed up on the stumps. DIlshan defends
tossed up again, but further down leg side. Dilshan misses with his sweep.
length ball, pitched outside leg stump and straightened. Dilshan rocks back and punches that in front of square to the deep fielder
fuller and on off stump, Dilshan hits that to cover and runs. Would have been home, even if the throw had hit the stumps
top edged sweep, but safe. Deep midwicket runs around to stop the ball inside the rope
length on off stump, Dilshan tries to work that onto the on side but is hit on the pad. They run through and Starc allows an overthrow after his shy at the stumps misses
wide and shortish, Dilshan can't connect with a big drive
gets back on that one, and into the gap on the off side
walloped, but short cover stops it. It was full and wide, Dilshan times his cover drive well, but for no reward
the dilscoop gets six! It was length on off stump at 144 kph, and Dilshan kneels to send that high over the keeper and into the seats. Haven't seen that in a while.
full on off stump, mistimes a drive to short cover
short of a length outside off stump, glides it to third man
comes down the pitch and tries another drive, but mistimes it. Gets it as far as mid on and sprints to the other end.
super shot that. Back of a length outside off stump and he stood his ground and bludgeoned it corss-batted over long on for six.
dropped, but it was a tough chance. Short and wide, cut hard by Perera, and it bursts through the hands of Maxwell at backward point, who is reaching as high as he can.
fuller and outside off stump, Perera drives but misses
back-of-a-length on leg stump, swivels to pull that to fine leg
poor bowling there. A real loosener. Short, wide and cut away over point for four
slows it down to 113kph. Length outside off stump, Perera fends that away to backward point
slower ball on the stumps, turned into the leg side
Short of a length, just outside off stump. Dilshan tries to cut but misses

he's hit Dilshan with a bouncer, and the batsman goes to one knee immediately. Looks like it hit him on the visor and that pushed the helmet back onto Dilshan's forehead. He's getting some treatment now, but seems alright.
charges down and tries to carve that length ball over the off side, but can't make any contact
edged, but a little luck again. Back of a length outside off stump. Perera tried to turn that onto the leg side, but got a leading edge, which landed safely behind square on the off side
almost a run out! Dilshan drills it straight to mid on, but Perera takes off, and had the shy hit the stumps, he would have been just short
slower bouncer outside off stump, Dilshan can't make contact. Looked to be just above his head.
this one is a wide. Short ball down leg side.
full, wide yorker. Dilshan tries to get hsi bat down on that, but misses again. Can't seem to come to terms with the pace in the pitch yet.
length on the stumps, Dilshan pushes it to mid off
yorker on the pads, Perera tried to clip that away but missed. Batsmen take a leg bye.
short ball over the stumps, Perera tries to pull, but plays over the ball
makes room and carves that over backward point for four. Length on off stump, and he connected well
shortish again and on the stumps, tucked away into the leg side
cover drives a length ball uppishly, but mistimes it. Just clears short cover and they take one. He's broken his bat with that shot.
fullish ball on the stumps, picked up and hit over midwicket. Hauled in before the boundary, but Perera has found the gaps smartly so far
another big swing and a miss. Back of a length on off stump, another big swish fails to make contact.
pitches outside leg and straightens, Perera tried to glance that, but it hits his pads and they take a leg bye

marvelous catch from Laughlin! What a take. Dilshan runs down the pitch, and Doherty turns it away enough to take the outside edge. Laughlin is running back from point and the ball seemed to be landing safely, but he puts in a terrific dive and snaffles it.
tossed up on middle stump, Perera hits that straight to short third man.
full on the stumps, turned to deep midwicket. Wade's inability to collect cleanly allows a second.
tossed up outside off stump to take a thick outside edge. The batsmen run two as third man runs around
slightly shorter, and cut to third man for another two
tossed up outside off stump, Mahela misses with a cut
straighter, turned behind square on the leg side

gone! And Perera's promising innings ends. Length ball spinning away and bouncing outside off stump. Perera rocked back to cut it, and gets a top edge to Wade, who pouches a decent deflection. Good innings from Perera though, while Dilshan struggled.
misfield allows one. Tossed up wide, and Chandimal gets an outside edge to short third man, who can't field cleanly
goes back to dab that late, but can't beat Doherty at short third man.
full and hit uppishly to long off for a single
angled in and straightening, Chandimal opens the face and knocks it into the off side
full and straightening again, Jayawardene knocks that back to the bowler
shorter this time, and he goes on the back foot to work it into the leg side
length on the stumps and straightening, worked into the on side again
tossed up outside off stump, Mahela drives that towards deep cover
advances to get to the ball on the full and drives it to long off for one

down the track, and he holes out trying to clear the short, straight fence. Didn't quite get to the pitch of the ball there, and mistimed it off the toe end. Cutting takes it securely above his head and Sri Lanka need someone to stand up here, or they will throw away another good start.
tossed up outside off, Mathews pushes that back to the bowler
fullish, driven to long on
not all that wide, but goes back to dab that again, but straight to the fielder
goes back and it's shorter this time, and he cuts it well. There's a chase, but they can't stop it.
quick and flat, another cut is attempted, but he can't connect
flat on middle stump, defended
short of a good length, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
worked away through square leg into the deep for a well-run couple
angling in towards middle, gets across and works it wide of midwicket for a single

bowled! That's a wicket Australia really needed. Mahela is done in by the dip there. Tried to turn it to the on side, but it's full and it sneaks under the bat to hit the pad, and then take off stump.
round the wicket, lands on leg stump and he works it wide of midwicket for a single
short of a length outside off and that's nicely struck, rocks on the back foot and cuts it past point for a couple of runs
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and knocks it away into the off side
shortish, on the back foot and turns it wide of midwicket for a single
shortish on the off, gets back and pushes it wide of a diving midwicket for a single
floating outside off, eases it through the infield on the off side for a single
drives that one down the ground to long-on for a single
slower one on the off, gets forward and works it wide of midwicket for a single
helped on its way to the fine-leg boundary, that was bowled short outside leg and he just had to get some bat to it

consecutive fours, streaky this time, pitched up outside off and he tried to be expansive there, tried to drive it hard through extra cover, got a thick edge wide of the outstretched left hand of Wade for four more
pushed that one past the bowler for a single
pitched up outside off, pushed past Laughlin towards long-off for a single
yorker length on middle, digs it out into the off side for a single
full and on off stump, Thirmanne opens the face and drives it towards deep cover. They scamper two, but a better throw might have had them in trouble.
slower ball, knocked into the vacant leg side infield
short of a length, mathews jumps to get on top of that one and tucks it wide of deep square leg
short again, outside off stump, Mathews drags it towards deep square leg again
slower ball again, hit off the pads into the leg side infield
good length ball angling into off stump, Mathews can only defend that back to the bowler
fullish and on the stumps, driven to long on
angled into off stump and straightening, Mathews defends on the front foot
misfield and four. Australia can't afford that now. Mathews ran down the pitch and drilled it back past the bowler. Warner came around from long on, but dived over the ball as it passed him.
tossed up and that's another crucial boundary. Mathews aims that square of long on this time, and hits it aerially. Warner can't get close to it this time.
flatter and straighter, hit back to Finch
flat again, and full. Mathews hits it back to the bowler
lovely ball to beat an expansive drive, full outside off stump and moving slightly away.

backs away and picks out backward with an aerial square drive. It was fullish and on the stumps, Thirimanne gets that on the outside of his bat and it flies to Voges, who takes a sharp chance above his head. Australia still very much in this. Another wicket could spark a panic.
full and angled into leg stump, Perera digs it out and they scamper one to the leg side
slower ball, 125 kph, short of a length and on leg stump. Mathews tucks that to fine leg
full, fast and straight. Perera aims a big, aerial drive, but doesn't get near it
full and outside off stump, Perera drills it hard to mid on, and can't take a run.
slower ball off cutter, and it just misses the off stump. Mathews went for drive, but it beats his inside edge
shot! Overpitched and punished. Mathews stood his ground and struck that clean back over the bowler's head and way over the boundary.
another slower ball and almost a return catch. Mathews played early, got a leading edge, and Laughlin almost makes the diving catch. Close call.
worked away to backward square leg
slower ball again, and Perera turns that to the leg side. A run out chance there, but the throw was to the wrong end and the batsmen get back
sliding yorker outside off stump, Perera digs it out towards deep cover
full and angled into the legs, Perera clears the front leg and drives it to long on
slower ball on the stumps, Mathews turns that behind square on the leg side. There is thought of two, but they wisely decide against it
141 kph, a wide yorker, Perera swings hard at that but can't get close to it
terrific bowling, and that shaved leg stump. Yorker angled in, Perera swings big again, aiming over mid on, and can't connect.
length ball this time, and Perera swings that aerially to deep midwicket for two.
full outside off stump, and Perera can only drive that back to Starc, who does well to stop it
full toss on middle stump, and Mathews doesn't hit that as well as he would like. Gets it in the gap and deep midwicket though, and gets two
there's not mishit there. Another full toss, shin high, and wider this time, and Mathews drills it along the ground to the straight boundary.
Mathews advances, but Laughlin changes himself and almost yorks him. The ball bounces over Laughlin's head and there's a single to long off.
and that's what Perera's in the team for. Slightly overpitched on middle stump, right in Perera's hitting area and he just clears the deep midwicket fielder, who gets a hand to it.
it's all over! Wonderful striking from Perera to close it out. slightly overpitched again and Perera throws everything at it, and hits it flat and hard over long on for six.
